            <div class="ps-relative overflow-hidden">
                <p class="mb2"><strong>Teams</strong></p>
                <p class="mb16 fs-caption fc-medium">Q&amp;A for Work</p>
                <p class="mb8 fs-caption fc-medium">
                        
                            Stack Overflow for Teams is a private, secure spot for you and

                </p>
                <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/teams"
                   class="js-gps-track ws-nowrap d-block"
                   data-gps-track="teams.create.left-sidenav.click({ Action: CtaClick })"
                   data-ga="[&quot;teams left navigation - anonymous&quot;,&quot;left nav cta&quot;,&quot;stackoverflow.com/teams&quot;,null,null]">
                        Learn more
                </a>
            </div>

            <div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
                <svg width="53" height="49" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M49 11l.2 31H18.9L9 49v-7H4V8h31" fill="#CCEAFF" /><path d="M44.5 19v-.3l-.2-.1-18-13-.1-.1H.5v33h4V46l.8-.6 9.9-6.9h29.3V19z" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M31 2l6-1.5 7 2V38H14.9L5 45v-7H1V6h25l5-4z" fill="#fff" /><path d="M7 16.5h13m-13 6h14m-14 6h18" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M39 30a14 14 0 1 0 0-28 14 14 0 0 0 0 28z" fill="#FFB935" /><path d="M50.5 14a13.5 13.5 0 1 1-27 0 13.5 13.5 0 0 1 27 0z" stroke="#F48024" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M32.5 21.5v-8h9v8h-9zm2-9.5V9.3A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 37 6.8a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 2.5 2.5V12h-5zm2 3v2m1-2v2" stroke="#fff" stroke-miterlimit="10" /></svg>
            </div>
        </div>

</div>


        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=name" data-nav-xhref="" title="tags in alphabetical order" data-value="name" data-shortcut="">
            Name</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=new" data-nav-xhref="" title="recently created tags" data-value="new" data-shortcut="">
            New</a>
    </div>

    </div>

    <div id="tags_list">

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

            <h3><a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites">more stack exchange communities</a>
            </h3>
            <a href="https://stackoverflow.blog" class="fr">company blog</a>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="child-content"></div>
        </div>        
    </div>
    </li>
</ol>

    </div>
</header>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

        </div>

                        Facebook Platform lets developers integrate their apps directly into the Facebook social networking service. Use this tag for questions which may arise when developing FOR Facebook. This tag is NOT fo&hellip;
                    </div>

                <div class="mt-auto grid jc-space-between fs-caption fc-black-300">
                    <div class="grid--cell">84200 questions</div>
                    <div class="grid--cell s-anchors s-anchors__inherit"><a 
    href="/questions/tagged/facebook?sort=newest&amp;days=1"
    title="14 questions tagged facebook in the last 24 hours">14 asked today</a>, <a 
    href="/questions/tagged/facebook?sort=newest&amp;days=7"
    title="60 questions tagged facebook in the last 7 days">60 this week</a></div>
                </div>
            </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

            </div>

            <div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
                <svg width="53" height="49" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M49 11l.2 31H18.9L9 49v-7H4V8h31" fill="#CCEAFF" /><path d="M44.5 19v-.3l-.2-.1-18-13-.1-.1H.5v33h4V46l.8-.6 9.9-6.9h29.3V19z" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M31 2l6-1.5 7 2V38H14.9L5 45v-7H1V6h25l5-4z" fill="#fff" /><path d="M7 16.5h13m-13 6h14m-14 6h18" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M39 30a14 14 0 1 0 0-28 14 14 0 0 0 0 28z" fill="#FFB935" /><path d="M50.5 14a13.5 13.5 0 1 1-27 0 13.5 13.5 0 0 1 27 0z" stroke="#F48024" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M32.5 21.5v-8h9v8h-9zm2-9.5V9.3A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 37 6.8a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 2.5 2.5V12h-5zm2 3v2m1-2v2" stroke="#fff" stroke-miterlimit="10" /></svg>
            </div>
        </div>

</div>


        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=name" data-nav-xhref="" title="tags in alphabetical order" data-value="name" data-shortcut="">
            Name</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=new" data-nav-xhref="" title="recently created tags" data-value="new" data-shortcut="">
            New</a>
    </div>

    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://stats.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="people interested in statistics, machine learning, data analysis, data mining, and data visualization">Cross Validated (stats)</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://cstheory.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="theoretical computer scientists and researchers in related fields">Theoretical Computer Science</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://physics.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="active researchers, academics and students of physics">Physics</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="scientists, academics, teachers, and students in the field of chemistry">Chemistry</a></li>

                    </ul></div><div class="site-footer--col site-footer--category js-footer-col" data-name="Science"><ul class="-list">

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

            </div>

            <div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
                <svg width="53" height="49" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M49 11l.2 31H18.9L9 49v-7H4V8h31" fill="#CCEAFF" /><path d="M44.5 19v-.3l-.2-.1-18-13-.1-.1H.5v33h4V46l.8-.6 9.9-6.9h29.3V19z" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M31 2l6-1.5 7 2V38H14.9L5 45v-7H1V6h25l5-4z" fill="#fff" /><path d="M7 16.5h13m-13 6h14m-14 6h18" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M39 30a14 14 0 1 0 0-28 14 14 0 0 0 0 28z" fill="#FFB935" /><path d="M50.5 14a13.5 13.5 0 1 1-27 0 13.5 13.5 0 0 1 27 0z" stroke="#F48024" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M32.5 21.5v-8h9v8h-9zm2-9.5V9.3A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 37 6.8a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 2.5 2.5V12h-5zm2 3v2m1-2v2" stroke="#fff" stroke-miterlimit="10" /></svg>
            </div>
        </div>

</div>


        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=name" data-nav-xhref="" title="tags in alphabetical order" data-value="name" data-shortcut="">
            Name</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=new" data-nav-xhref="" title="recently created tags" data-value="new" data-shortcut="">
            New</a>
    </div>

    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>

            <h3><a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites">more stack exchange communities</a>
            </h3>
            <a href="https://stackoverflow.blog" class="fr">company blog</a>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="child-content"></div>
        </div>        
    </div>
    </li>
</ol>

    </div>
</header>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

            </div>

            <div class="ps-absolute t8 r8">
                <svg width="53" height="49" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M49 11l.2 31H18.9L9 49v-7H4V8h31" fill="#CCEAFF" /><path d="M44.5 19v-.3l-.2-.1-18-13-.1-.1H.5v33h4V46l.8-.6 9.9-6.9h29.3V19z" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M31 2l6-1.5 7 2V38H14.9L5 45v-7H1V6h25l5-4z" fill="#fff" /><path d="M7 16.5h13m-13 6h14m-14 6h18" stroke="#1060E1" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M39 30a14 14 0 1 0 0-28 14 14 0 0 0 0 28z" fill="#FFB935" /><path d="M50.5 14a13.5 13.5 0 1 1-27 0 13.5 13.5 0 0 1 27 0z" stroke="#F48024" stroke-miterlimit="10" /><path d="M32.5 21.5v-8h9v8h-9zm2-9.5V9.3A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 37 6.8a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 2.5 2.5V12h-5zm2 3v2m1-2v2" stroke="#fff" stroke-miterlimit="10" /></svg>
            </div>
        </div>

</div>


        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=name" data-nav-xhref="" title="tags in alphabetical order" data-value="name" data-shortcut="">
            Name</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=new" data-nav-xhref="" title="recently created tags" data-value="new" data-shortcut="">
            New</a>
    </div>

    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

    <div class="site-footer--col site-footer--category js-footer-col" data-name="Science">
        <ul class="-list">

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://physics.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="active researchers, academics and students of physics">Physics</a></li>

                    </ul></div><div class="site-footer--col site-footer--category js-footer-col" data-name="Science"><ul class="-list">

                        <strong>

                <a class="s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__icon js-notice-close" aria-label="notice-dismiss">
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconClear" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M15 4.41L13.59 3 9 7.59 4.41 3 3 4.41 7.59 9 3 13.59 4.41 15 9 10.41 13.59 15 15 13.59 10.41 9 15 4.41z"/></svg>
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function () { StackExchange.topbar.init(); });
        StackExchange.scrollPadding.setPaddingTop(50, 10);     </script>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

            <div class="s-card js-tag-cell grid fd-column">
                <div class="grid jc-space-between ai-center mb12">
                    <div class="grid--cell">
                        <a href="/questions/tagged/interface" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;interface&#39;" rel="tag">interface</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                    <div class="grid--cell fc-light mb12 v-truncate4">
                        An interface refers to the designated point of interaction with a component. Interfaces are applicable at both the hardware and software level.

---

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=name" data-nav-xhref="" title="tags in alphabetical order" data-value="name" data-shortcut="">
            Name</a>
        <a class="grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=new" data-nav-xhref="" title="recently created tags" data-value="new" data-shortcut="">
            New</a>
    </div>

    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

                        <strong>
                            more (8)

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function () { StackExchange.topbar.init(); });
        StackExchange.scrollPadding.setPaddingTop(50, 10);     </script>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

                        an enclosing context where values and expressions are associated. Use this tag for questions about different types of scope as well for questions where scope may be unclear.

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

                        Character encoding refers to the way characters are represented as a series of bytes. Character encoding for the Web is defined in the Encoding Standard.
                    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>

                    </ul></div><div class="site-footer--col site-footer--category js-footer-col" data-name="Science"><ul class="-list">

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://philosophy.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="those interested in the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence">Philosophy</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://linguistics.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="professional linguists and others with an interest in linguistic research and theory">Linguistics</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://psychology.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="practitioners, researchers, and students in cognitive science, psychology, neuroscience, and psychiatry">Psychology &amp; Neuroscience</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://scicomp.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="scientists using computers to solve scientific problems">Computational Science</a></li>
                            <li class="-item">
                    <a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites#science" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 26 })">
                        <strong>
                            more (8)

        StackExchange.scrollPadding.setPaddingTop(50, 10);     </script>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

                    </div>
                </div>

                    <div class="grid--cell fc-light mb12 v-truncate4">
                        an existing library or set of libraries that provides overarching application structure so that the developer can focus primarily on their application&#39;s implementation details instead. &hellip;
                    </div>

                    </div>
                </div>

                    <div class="grid--cell fc-light mb12 v-truncate4">

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>

                    </ul></div><div class="site-footer--col site-footer--category js-footer-col" data-name="Science"><ul class="-list">

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://philosophy.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="those interested in the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence">Philosophy</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://linguistics.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="professional linguists and others with an interest in linguistic research and theory">Linguistics</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://psychology.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="practitioners, researchers, and students in cognitive science, psychology, neuroscience, and psychiatry">Psychology &amp; Neuroscience</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://scicomp.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="scientists using computers to solve scientific problems">Computational Science</a></li>
                            <li class="-item">
                    <a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites#science" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 26 })">
                        <strong>
                            more (8)

        StackExchange.scrollPadding.setPaddingTop(50, 10);     </script>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

                <div class="grid jc-space-between ai-center mb12">
                    <div class="grid--cell">
                        <a href="/questions/tagged/user-controls" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;user-controls&#39;" rel="tag">user-controls</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                    <div class="grid--cell fc-light mb12 v-truncate4">
                        a separate, reusable input control that allows a user to interact with an application. User controls can be buttons, checkboxes, input text boxes, mice, keyboards, etc.
                    </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

                    <div class="grid--cell fc-light mb12 v-truncate4">

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://scicomp.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="scientists using computers to solve scientific problems">Computational Science</a></li>
                            <li class="-item">
                    <a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites#science" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 26 })">
                        <strong>
                            more (8)
                        </strong>
                    </a>
                </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">
            Popular</a>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>

        <div id="content" class="snippet-hidden">


            

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

                <li class="-item"><a href="https://linguistics.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="professional linguists and others with an interest in linguistic research and theory">Linguistics</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://psychology.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="practitioners, researchers, and students in cognitive science, psychology, neuroscience, and psychiatry">Psychology &amp; Neuroscience</a></li>
                <li class="-item"><a href="https://scicomp.stackexchange.com" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 25 })" title="scientists using computers to solve scientific problems">Computational Science</a></li>
                            <li class="-item">
                    <a href="https://stackexchange.com/sites#science" class="-link js-gps-track" data-gps-track="footer.click({ location: 2, link: 26 })">
                        <strong>
                            more (8)
                        </strong>
                    </a>
                </li>
        </ul>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap">
        <div class="grid--cell ps-relative mb12">
            <input id="tagfilter" class="s-input s-input__search h100" autocomplete="off" name="tagfilter" type="text" maxlength="35" placeholder="Filter by tag name" autofocus>
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

        
<div class="grid--cell ml-auto mb12 grid s-btn-group js-filter-btn">
        <a class="youarehere is-selected grid--cell s-btn s-btn__muted s-btn__outlined" href="/tags?tab=popular" data-nav-xhref="" title="most popular tags" data-value="popular" data-shortcut="">

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div id="mainbar-full">
        <h1 class="fs-headline1 mb16">
            Tags
        </h1>

    <p class="fs-body2 wmx6 mb16">
        A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
    </p>

    <div class="grid fw-wrap gs4 mb24 ai-center">

            <a class="grid--cell s-link fs-body1" href="/tags/synonyms">Show all tag synonyms</a>
    </div>

            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon s-input-icon s-input-icon__search iconSearch" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18"><path d="M18 16.5l-5.14-5.18h-.35a7 7 0 1 0-1.19 1.19v.35L16.5 18l1.5-1.5zM12 7A5 5 0 1 1 2 7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0z"/></svg>
        </div>

    <script>
        StackExchange.ready(function() {
            $("#tagfilter").typeWatch({ highlight:true, wait:500, captureLength: -1, callback: finished });
        });

        var request = null;
        function finished(txt) {
            if (request) { request.abort(); }
            request = $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/filter/tags-for-index",
                data: { filter: txt, tab: 'Popular', fkey: StackExchange.options.user.fkey },
                dataType: "html",
                success: function (result) {
                    var domelement = $(result);
                    $("#tags_list > *").remove();
                    $("#tags_list").prepend(domelement);

                    if (txt == "") {
                        $(".pager").show();
                    } else
                    {
                        $(".pager").hide();
                    }

                }
            });
        }
    </script>
</div>
        </div>
